charinfo.name: Kidoumaru
charinfo.description: A member of the Sound Five, Kidoumaru resembles a spider in both appearance and fighting style. Kidoumaru is able to trap enemies in his web while assaulting them from afar with both spiders and powerful arrows.

abilities.name: Spider Bow: Fierce Rip
abilities.description: Kidoumaru fires a special arrow made of enzymes from his mouth at one enemy dealing 50 piercing damage.

abilities.name: Summoning: Kyodaigumo
abilities.description: Kidoumaru summons Kyodaigumo who creates a massive amount of small spiders that do 10 damage each turn for 5 turns to all enemies. The following 5 turns, Kidoumaru gains 10 points of damage reduction and any new skill an enemy uses will have its cooldown increased by 1.

abilities.name: Spiral Web
abilities.description: Kidoumaru protects himself or an ally. The first harmful physical skill used on that character will be countered. This skill is invisible.

abilities.name: Golden Armor
abilities.description: This skill makes Kidoumaru invulnerable for 1 turn.
